pages.text: $(li)The Chorus Fruit is a food that can be obtained when you cut a Chorus Plant.$(br)$(li)If you eat it, you will be teleported up to 8 blocks in any direction.$(br)$(li)You can obtain a Popped Chorus Fruit Smelting a Chorus Fruit in a Furnace.
$(li)You can use it to craft Chorus Planks, a Chorus Fruit on a Stick, a Magnet, or a Chorus Fruit Batch in a Crafting Table too.
